name: Deadpool 2
actors: Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin, Julian Dennison
desc: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.

name: Avengers: Infinity War
actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans
desc: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

name: Ocean's Eight
actors: Sandra Bullock, Griffin Dunne, Deidre Goodwin, Daniella Rabbani
desc: Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.

name: Black Panther
actors: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira
desc: T'Challa, the King of Wakanda, rises to the throne in the isolated, technologically advanced African nation, but his claim is challenged by a vengeful outsider who was a childhood victim of T'Challa's father's mistake.

name: Thor: Ragnarok
actors: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Idris Elba
desc: Imprisoned, the mighty Thor finds himself in a lethal gladiatorial contest against the Hulk, his former ally. Thor must fight for survival and race against time to prevent the all-powerful Hela from destroying his home and the Asgardian civilization.

name: Tomb Raider
actors: Alicia Vikander, Dominic West, Walton Goggins, Daniel Wu
desc: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father disappeared.

name: Stolen princess: Ruslan and Ludmila
actors: Nadiya Dorofeeva, Oleksiy Zavhorodniy, Yevhen Malukha, Serhiy Prytula
desc: This wonderful story happened in the age of valiant knights, beautiful princesses, and battling sorcerers. Ruslan, a wandering artist dreaming to become a knight, met beautiful Mila and ...
